jobDescription: The Zebra -- recently named one of Austin’s Best Places to Work by the Austin Business Journal -- is expanding our Data team. Were looking for someone with sharp mathematical chops, lots of experience, and great mentorship skills to build upon and grow our data efforts.  The Zebra is seeking a Senior Data Scientist for our dynamic start-up! This person will be responsible for performing statistical data analysis, helping ensure data quality, and finding areas where we can harness our data to improve our product. You will immediately contribute to our goal of leveraging our rich datasets to make smarter business decisions. You should have a strong scientific background in statistics, optimization, and machine learning, be very curious, and have a focus on seeing and implementing the results of your analysis. You will have a great deal of ownership and broad responsibilities within a fast-growing company in a massive industry.What Youll Do:
